comments: He is nice and kind all that but made me wonder if this was middle school class. Stuff we did was so low level that I barely learned about reading and writing. I get it it\'s 101 but it can be more educational. His answers to the question we ask can be very vague as well if you know what you\'re doing and you can see he doesn\'t know the deep content.

comments: I had mixed feelings about Leary\'s class. Mostly because it took me a really long time to really grasp the goal of our first assignment. He\'s super nice though, and always willing to help or answer questions. I wouldn\'t say this class is an easy A, it does require a bit of work mentally (Meaning you have to stay on top of things on your end).

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Great professor who really cares and wants his students to do well in class. Come to class everyday on time and you\'ll pass without a doubt. I had him for a summer session and all we did was watch three movies (and write an essay about them), fun in-class writing assignments, and an essay on short stories. It would be harder not to pass his class.

comments: Good Prof. Gives you everything you need to do well. Assigns an anthology early on in the course and will basically be the main theme of all your classes over the course of the semester. His voice can lull you to sleep if you\'re not awake in time for class. Other than that I\'d recommend him.

comments: Professor Leary was very direct with what he expecte from everyone. This is college, if you don\'t want to work hard then don\'t come. We had 4 essays in total that required us to work extra hard. He is always available if you need help (as long as you go to class). He is very chill and down to earth. Go to class and do the work and you will get an A

comments: I took the summer class so there were only 2 drafts and a final paper. If you showed up the first few days you got 5 point on your average if you hand in a paragraph. He gave 1 extra credit. There were little to no readings. He is a not a hard grader. If you hand in everything and show up, you\'ll pass. If you go the extra mile you\'ll get an A.

Does not make an effort to reply to emails or advice. Does not take attendance. Would not recommend. Always sounds uncertain of critiria.

comments: I took Professor Leary my first semester in college, straight out of high school. All the theories that I had heard about college English throughout my years of living were all proven wrong. He is an AWESOME Professor.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. comments: Prof Leary is very nice guy. He is very helpful and very patient with the students. When i was in his class we were doing this anthology project for the whole semester. Sometimes this class is so boring for me, but for some people they like it because they dont have to do a lot of thing. I recommend this class if you want an easy grade.
